name: Bloody Ladle
description:
For the best experience, play in full screen mode!

Only the light of the full moon penetrated the basement of this crypt.  Hell on earth has begun.  Blood massacre.  The air hummed with magic as everyone present turned into vile monsters.  The only way to save yourself and your beloved was an equal sacrifice.  A sacrifice, in the form of 1000 liters of blood.

Action Keyboard/MouseMoveWASD/ArrowsHitXHeal (need blood!)EJumpZ/Space

Fill the bloody altar, save your soul!
